de.hartschen.wne

Class WNEPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • de.hartschen.wne.WNEPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IView, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ViewController

    public class WNEPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements IView
    Die Klasse WNEPanel definiert ein JPane zum Zeichnen.
    Author:
    Jens Hartschen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
